IXO RAM601 Ford Fiesta RS WRC 2014 Rally Catalunya – Costa Daurada 12th Place K. Block/A. Gelsomino



Ken Block is more widely known for his Gymkhana exploits but he has also been rallying since 2005. He started in the Rally America championship and consistently scored top 5 finishes from 2005-2009. In 2010 he started to shift his attention to the WRC and contested 7 rounds in 2010 and 8 rounds in 2011. In 2012 he became more involved in the Global Rallycross championship and his WRC participation decreased to one event (typically Mexico or Catalunya) most years.

Catalunya was the one WRC round Block contested in 2014 for M-Sport in the Ford Fiesta seen here. It was looking like a top 10 finish for Block & Gelsomino but a puncture on the final stage saw them finish in 12th place.
